text: The Eurovision Song Contest 2026 will be the 70th edition of the Eurovision Song Contest. The contest will be held in Austria, after their win at the 2025 contest with the song "Wasted Love" by JJ. It will be organised by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) and host broadcaster Ã–sterreichischer Rundfunk (ORF). It will be the third that the country will host the contest, having done so previously in 1967 and 2015, both times being held in Vienna. ==References== ==Other websites== * 2026
title: Eurovision Song Contest 2026
